product.title: Lenovo Legion Pro 5i Gen 9 Gaming Laptop, 14th Gen Intel 24-Core i9-14900HX, RTX 4070 8 GB, 16" WQXGA 240Hz Display, 64 GB DDR5, 8 TB SSD, 4-Zone RGB Backlit, WiFi 6E, Win 11 Pro, w/Lifetime Office

product.categories_flat: Electronics > Computers & Accessories > Computers & Tablets > Laptops > Traditional Laptops
product.description:
Statement:
Original Seal is opened for upgrade ONLY. If the computer has modifications, then the manufacturer box is opened for it to be tested and inspected and to install the upgrades to achieve the specifications as advertised.


GENERAL INFORMATION

Brand: Lenovo

Model Number: 83DF00AQUS

Series: Lenovo Legion Pro 5i Gen 9 Gaming Laptop- Intel 14th Gen Core i9- NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 8GB

Color: Onyx Grey

Operating System: Windows 11 Pro


PROCESSOR

CPU: 14th Gen Intel i9-14900HX processor

Number of Cores: 24

Number of Threads: 32

E-Core Max Turbo Frequency: 4.1 GHz

P-Core Max Turbo Frequency: 5.8 GHz


GRAPHICS

Graphics Type: Dedicated

GPU: NVIDIA Geforce RTX 4070

Graphics RAM: 8 GB GDDR6


DISPLAY

Display Size: 16 inches

Resolution: 2560 x 1600 (WQXGA)

Refresh Rate: 240 Hz

Display Screen Type: IPS, Anti-glare, 100% DCI-P3,HDR 400,Low Blue Light, High Gaming Performance 

Brightness: 500 nits


MEMORY & STORAGE

Capacity: 64 GB DDR5

Storage: 8 TB SSD


PORTS

1 x Ethernet (RJ45)

1x USB-C 3.2 Gen 2 (DisplayPort 1.4)

1x USB-C 3.2 Gen 2 (DisplayPort 1.4 + Power Delivery 140W)

2 x USB-A 3.2 Gen 1

2 x USB-A 3.2 Gen 1(Always On USB 5V2A)

1 x Electronic e-shutter switch

1 x Headset (Headphone and Microphone Combo) Port

1x Power input

1 x HDMI 2.1


WIRELESS

Wi-Fi 6E

Bluetooth 5.1 


FEATURES

Keyboard: 4-Zone RGB Backlit

Audio Technology: 2x2W speaker system w/ Nahimic Audio

Camera: 1080P FHD with Electronic Privacy Shutter and Microphone


PHYSICAL SPECIFICATIONS

Length: 14.3 inches

Width: 10.25 inches

Height: 0.88 -1.05 inches

Weight: 5.51 lbs
feature_bullets: 14th Gen Intel i9-14900HX Processor: Equipped with the 14th Gen Intel i9 14900HX processor (24 cores, 36M cache, up to 5.80 GHz, total 32 threads). With the latest processor for data reading and faster processing, your Lenovo legion pro 5i gen 9 gaming laptop can call data more efficiently in multitasking and complex calculations, improve overall performance, so that you can meet the needs of demanding games, content creation and multitasking at the same time

Cutting-Edge Graphics: The lenovo legion pro 5i Gaming Laptop equipped with an NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 8 GB GDDR6 GPU, this laptop delivers exceptional graphical prowess ideal for gaming and creative workloads. The RTX 4070 supports real-time ray tracing and AI-accelerated graphics, bringing breathtaking visual effects and high frame rates to your screen

Premium Display:16" WQXGA (2560 x 1600), IPS, Anti-Glare, HDR 400, 100%DCI-P3, 500 nits, 240Hz, Low Blue Light.Quick-scope your enemies into oblivion on the cutting-edge Lenovo PureSight Gaming display, now X-Rite Pantone certified and factory-calibrated. The screen takes up 93.08% of the display's surface area, making it look like your picture is floating in space. Plus, HDR and high color accuracy let you see every detail of your game, no matter how bright or dark the in-game environment gets

Seamless Multitasking with Ample Storage: Enhance your productivity with up to 64 GB of high-speed DDR5 RAM, allowing you to run multiple applications and browser tabs simultaneously without lag. Up to 8 TB SSD ensures lightning-fast boot-up times and provides generous storage space for your files, apps, and multimedia

Gaming Laptop with Comprehensive Software Suite: The package includes a lifetime license for Microsoft Office, granting access to vital productivity tools. Furthermore, the laptop runs on Windows 11 Pro, offering a sleek, user-centric operating system with bolstered security features and optimized gaming performance(Any Upgrade Issues Please send Message)

The RTX 4070 supports real-time ray tracing and AI-accelerated graphics, bringing breathtaking visual effects and high frame rates to your screen. 14th Gen Intel i9-14900HX Processor: Equipped with the 14th Gen Intel i9 14900HX processor (24 cores, 36M cache, up to 5.80 GHz, total 32 threads). With the latest processor for data reading and faster processing, your Lenovo legion pro 5i gen 9 gaming laptop can call data more efficiently in multitasking and complex calculations, improve overall performance, so that you can meet the needs of demanding games, content creation and multitasking at the same time.

top_reviews.title: Perfect for the internet!
top_reviews.body: To the point: worked right out of the box, easy to sign in, easy to use, super fast for simple internet stuff, the battery legit lasts all day between actual use and sleep. It’s seen a week and a half of daily use and is great so far! I will absolutely update if it conks out, particularly within days of passing the return window. So far, for what we bought it for, couldn’t ask for more.  This was a present for my mom, who hates change and clings to her old computers like they’re precious family heirlooms, even when they’ve gotten painfully slow and the batteries are shot and it takes 20 minutes just to turn them on or off. Even when we gave it to her, she was saying she didn’t really need it, she was worried about “moving things,” “finding things,” “getting into things,” and I get it, moving devices can be a hassle, but she was also insisting that she doesn’t mind waiting the 20 minutes (not exaggerating) for her old laptop to boot up. She’s never had a chromebook (nor have I), it’s always been windows OS, but I didn’t want her to deal with the recent windows update that changed everything anyway and she really does only use her computers for internet stuff so it seemed like a good time to try a chromebook. My nephew said that if she mainly used the chrome browser on her old computer there wouldn’t even really be a learning curve, and he was right. There’ve been a few hiccups with some sites not looking or working the same but it’s mostly been smooth sailing from the moment we opened we box and she’s even commented (multiple times!) on how fast it turns on and off and how quickly it zips around the websites she uses. So far we are all very pleased! Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
To the point: worked right out of the box, easy to sign in, easy to use, super fast for simple internet stuff, the battery legit lasts all day between actual use and sleep. It’s seen a week and a half of daily use and is great so far! I will absolutely update if it conks out, particularly within days of passing the return window. So far, for what we bought it for, couldn’t ask for more.

This was a present for my mom, who hates change and clings to her old computers like they’re precious family heirlooms, even when they’ve gotten painfully slow and the batteries are shot and it takes 20 minutes just to turn them on or off. Even when we gave it to her, she was saying she didn’t really need it, she was worried about “moving things,” “finding things,” “getting into things,” and I get it, moving devices can be a hassle, but she was also insisting that she doesn’t mind waiting the 20 minutes (not exaggerating) for her old laptop to boot up. She’s never had a chromebook (nor have I), it’s always been windows OS, but I didn’t want her to deal with the recent windows update that changed everything anyway and she really does only use her computers for internet stuff so it seemed like a good time to try a chromebook. My nephew said that if she mainly used the chrome browser on her old computer there wouldn’t even really be a learning curve, and he was right. There’ve been a few hiccups with some sites not looking or working the same but it’s mostly been smooth sailing from the moment we opened we box and she’s even commented (multiple times!) on how fast it turns on and off and how quickly it zips around the websites she uses. So far we are all very pleased!

top_reviews.title: first chromebook
top_reviews.body: so chromebook world is different from microsoft- after 2 weeks i now have it mostly figured out. the new chromebook is 3x faster than my 10 yr old hp laptop-with the same home network.' enjoy the touch screen together with the touch pad - all in all I am good with the speed and features of the new 2022 lenovo chromebook. date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2022

top_reviews.title: Touchpad
top_reviews.body: I Really like this Chromebook!! But I opened it the morning of, what, the 7th Day I had it. The Touchpad did not work (the wireless mouse Did work)! 2 hours later with 4 Lenovo techs (3 on live chat, 1 in person chat) determined this fault could not be corrected with PowerWash. Had to be returned. Replaced with another identical. Stay Tuned for replacement results!! Didn't have it long enough to use the Touch Screen, actually. . . . Didn't have time enough to use a lot of the things this laptop is supposed to do. Disappointed So Far. Read more
top_reviews.body_html:

top_reviews.title: Excelente producto
top_reviews.body: Es una excelente computadora para jugadores casuales o para aquellos como yo que disfrutan de juegos que no requieren tanto proceso grafico. El sistema de lenovo vantage incluido es una excelente herramienta para revisar el estado del equipo. Por mi parte agregué otra memoria de 8GB y va muy bien. Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
Es una excelente computadora para jugadores casuales o para aquellos como yo que disfrutan de juegos que no requieren tanto proceso grafico. El sistema de lenovo vantage incluido es una excelente herramienta para revisar el estado del equipo. Por mi parte agregué otra memoria de 8GB y va muy bien.

top_reviews.title: Cumple con su función de jugar videojuegos y de trabajo
top_reviews.body: The media could not be loaded. Estuve probando la computadora con el juego GTA V, el cual es uno de los más demandante de recursos, y lo corrió muy fluido a 60 fps aprox o un poco más ocupando configuración en "normal" todo. La computadora jala bien, en esta semana de uso no he encontrado fallas aparentes, y para el vendedor yo creo que debería aclarar en su título o en la descripción que su tarjeta grafica es una 1650 ya que puede prestarse a confusiones el título o la descripción. A mi gusto personal el contra es que se calienta mucho, lo cual es normal, pero encontrando un ventilador externo o un modo de mantenerla elevada y con las rendijas con mucho espacio para jalar aire creo que va bien. Yo la estoy usando con solidworks 2020 y me ha jalado bien, además de jugar videojuegos. Otro contra es la duración de la batería, que usando solo ofimática puede durar unas 3 horas aprox, pero se entiende que es una pc gamer y casi siempre la tendrás conectada. Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
The media could not be loaded.
Estuve probando la computadora con el juego GTA V, el cual es uno de los más demandante de recursos, y lo corrió muy fluido a 60 fps aprox o un poco más ocupando configuración en "normal" todo. Yo la estoy usando con solidworks 2020 y me ha jalado bien, además de jugar videojuegos. Otro contra es la duración de la batería, que usando solo ofimática puede durar unas 3 horas aprox, pero se entiende que es una pc gamer y casi siempre la tendrás conectada.

top_reviews.title: Buen rendimiento por el precio
top_reviews.body: Es un buen equipo que por el precio te permite ocupar una tarjeta dedicada de video, que aunque sea de entrada da un buen rendimiento. La utilizo principalmente para Illustrator, Photoshop, edición de fotografía y ocasionalmente la he utilizado para jugar Warzone (gráficos medios y bajos) y Star Wars Squadrons (medios) sin ningún inconveniente. Read more

top_reviews.title: Increíble laptop
top_reviews.body: La computadora fue una compra para la ejecución de programas de ingeniería como lo es el Autocad. Por sus elementos no ha presentado problemas para correrlos e incluso puedo ejecutar otras aplicaciones en 2do plano sin problemas, sus componentes son muy buenos. Si bien al principio me sentía un poco escéptico hacia Lenovo porque la última que tuve se me descompuso muy rápido, con está ya llevo 6 meses y no ha fallado en nada Read more
